derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: with reference to the straight line supposedly taken instinctively by a bee when returning to the hive

entry.def: If you make a beeline for a place, you go to it as quickly and directly as possible.

example.ex: She made a beeline for the car.

sentences.sentence: "he made a beeline for the bathroom"
